## Notes & Observations

- **Pain Point:** Time management + rushing into code without big-O analysis.  
  **Mitigation:** Force 5-min "approach + complexity" before writing code.

- **Strength:** Solid async/await foundation (3/5) ‚Äî leverage this in Node section.

- **Critical Gaps:** React fundamentals (1/5) and DSA big-O reasoning (2/5) ‚Äî **prioritize these in Phase 1‚Äì2**.

## How to Update This File

After each session, commit with: `git commit -m "feat(progress): Week X.Y - [topic] - [result]"` (see [COMMIT_PROTOCOL.md](./COMMIT_PROTOCOL.md) for details).

Update:

- Session result (‚è≥ Pending ‚Üí ‚úÖ Complete / ‚ùå Retry)
- Time taken
- Notes on blockers or breakthroughs
- Checkpoint status
